comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: What a peculiar way of creating an Announcement thread. Buy a copper memes here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=credit;promote so that you can post an image if you are having a problem on making a desirable ANN thread. I noticed that the default language is on Arab, Make sure you change it on english as it’s very hard to locate the change language due to the arab text.The game content of your casino is fresh and I really like it! I will be watching on this thread for the feedbacks and promotion before I make any deposit.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, you need to get some things right with this thread, just like what the other member pointed out, I find it hard to navigate through your site because of the language barrier. And also making a good ANN thread is a good way to start in this forum, a list that will serve as a clue to what to expect on your platform, and making your ANN thread with images will give your casino a better promotion and affects the forum, I will be waiting to see your response on this feedback and how you intend to handle them to improve the overall quality of your casino and also improve your presence on this forum.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Is there any way to get the site translated immediately to English without having to look for the change language drop-down? The site design looks nice and easy on the eye, and there doesn't seem to be much of a clutter when it comes to the betting page. The interface on mobile however is kinda hard to understand especially since the default page language is in Arabic. Overall I'd say you have a great looking platform. I will not comment much about your platform just yet since I don't have much information on your bonuses and whatnot. There doesn't seem to be any on your Promotions tab just yet, only the $200 welcome bonus.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: dothebeats on July 23, 2022, 05:49:25 PMIs there any way to get the site translated immediately to English without having to look for the change language drop-down? try right-clicking on their website then click translate to English, this is usually what I do when I visit a website where English is not the default language.looks like people who want to register would need to provide KYC. this would discourage a lot of gamblers from this forum from trying out the gambling site. also, I suggest updating your announcement thread. since you now have a copper membership you can now post images and make your ANN thread a lot of informative and presentable.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: your website has a very nice designer. but you need to put English as the default language of your site, because it is difficult to find something with this Arabic language. You also need to create a thread (your topic) that is beautiful and with all the details of the things that your site is offering, for example:you have to put something relevant here about the TOS (if have KYC or not)you have to put here if you have any restrictions on deposit and withdrawal, in the value of bets, bonus, if you have or don't have a vip account

comments.body: Quote from: YASBET on July 23, 2022, 06:31:45 PMWeb Version you can see on the top right or if it is another language you can see on the top left also Please check I see you have Indonesian language as one of the available version but when I tried it, it does not show any Indonesian words there. What I see is combination between English and Arabic language when I switch to Indonesian. Seems you have not done the translation completely and it is better if you remove it first and put it back once it is ready.
